ICYMI: Ahead of the launch of the new#ConfinedSpaceTrainingSuite 6160,#CityandGuildsconfirmed that they will accept registration for the legacy training qualification (6150) until the end of 2021. During the transition period we can still deliver the 6150 training on request.

We've now switched over our Confined Space courses to the new 6160 suite but can still arrange to do the legacy 6150 courses until the end of this year. Get in touch with our team who can advise on the most suitable options.#ConfinedSpaceTraining#CityandGuilds
